data.taskDescription:
Descripción de tareas para completar el frontend en Flutter

Completar los 9 epics del frontend de la aplicación "Pasos" (contador de pasos social) usando Flutter.

================================================================================

CONTEXTO

================================================================================

El backend ya está completo en: project-app-pasos-backend

El frontend debe ir en: project-app-pasos-frontend-flutter (crear nueva estructura)

Usar Flutter para aplicación móvil nativa multiplataforma (iOS/Android)

================================================================================

EPICS A IMPLEMENTAR

================================================================================

FLUTTER FOUNDATION

Setup de Flutter + estructura del proyecto

Configuración de dependencias base (provider/bloc, dio, etc.)

PLATFORM CONFIG

Configuración para iOS/Android

Permisos para Health APIs (HealthKit/Google Fit)

Configuración de AndroidManifest.xml y Info.plist

UI FOUNDATION

Sistema de diseño con Material Design 3

Routing y navegación (go_router)

Tema oscuro/claro (ThemeData)

Widgets reutilizables

AUTH UI

Pantallas de login, registro y recuperación de contraseña

Gestión de estado de autenticación

Almacenamiento seguro de tokens (flutter_secure_storage)

DASHBOARD

Vista principal con contador de pasos

Historial de actividad

Gráficos (fl_chart o charts_flutter)

Pull-to-refresh

SHARING UI

Lista de amigos

Gestión de compartir datos con amigos

Solicitudes de amistad

Vista de actividad de amigos

GOALS UI

Grupos y metas compartidas

Creación y edición de metas

Progreso de grupos

Rankings

NATIVE INTEGRATION

Integración con podómetro nativo usando health package

Lectura de pasos desde HealthKit (iOS)

Lectura de pasos desde Google Fit/Health Connect (Android)

Background sync de datos

REAL-TIME CLIENT

Integración WebSocket con web_socket_channel

Actualizaciones en tiempo real

Notificaciones push (firebase_messaging)

Manejo de reconexión

epics.title: Flutter Foundation - Project Setup and Core Infrastructure
epics.description: Initialize Flutter project with Clean Architecture pattern, configure core dependencies (dio, get_it, riverpod, go_router, flutter_secure_storage), establish project structure with core utilities, error handling, environment configuration, and API client setup with authentication interceptor.

stories.title: Initialize Flutter project with pubspec.yaml and dependencies
stories.description: Create Flutter project structure, configure pubspec.yaml with all required dependencies: dio 5.x, get_it 7.x, injectable 2.x, flutter_riverpod 2.x, go_router 12.x, flutter_secure_storage 9.x, equatable 2.x, dartz 0.10.x, intl 0.18.x, connectivity_plus 5.x, health 8.x, web_socket_channel 2.x, firebase_messaging 14.x, fl_chart 0.65.x

stories.title: Create core constants and environment configuration
stories.description: Implement app constants (app name, default step goal), API endpoints matching backend routes (/auth, /steps, /sharing, /goals, /users), and environment setup for dev/staging/prod with different base URLs

stories.title: Implement error handling system with Either pattern
stories.description: Create exceptions (ServerException, CacheException, NetworkException) and failures (ServerFailure, CacheFailure, NetworkFailure) classes following Either pattern with dartz for functional error handling

stories.title: Setup dio API client with interceptors
stories.description: Configure dio HTTP client with base URL from environment, auth interceptor for JWT token injection and refresh, logging interceptor for debugging, error handling interceptor for standardized error responses

stories.title: Configure dependency injection with get_it
stories.description: Setup get_it service locator with all core dependencies registered: ApiClient, NetworkInfo, FlutterSecureStorage. Create initialization method to be called in main.dart

stories.title: Create utility classes and base models
stories.description: Implement logger utility wrapping dart:developer, validators for email/password/username matching backend rules, and base model/entity classes for inheritance

stories.title: Setup main.dart entry point with app bootstrap
stories.description: Configure main.dart with WidgetsFlutterBinding, DI initialization, environment setup, and initial MaterialApp shell. Add error handling for uncaught exceptions

epics.title: Platform Configuration - iOS and Android Health API Setup
epics.description: Configure iOS and Android platform settings including HealthKit permissions and entitlements for iOS, Google Fit/Health Connect permissions for Android with minSdk 26, app icons, splash screens, and all required manifest entries for health data access and background processing.
followsPatterns: Health API integration patterns for both platforms

stories.title: Configure Android manifest with health and activity permissions
stories.description: Setup AndroidManifest.xml with ACTIVITY_RECOGNITION, BODY_SENSORS, health permissions for Google Fit/Health Connect, INTERNET, FOREGROUND_SERVICE for background sync. Add activity declarations and intent filters

stories.title: Configure Android build.gradle with minSdk and dependencies
stories.description: Setup app-level build.gradle with minSdk 26 (required for Health Connect), targetSdk 34, kotlin version, health dependencies. Configure project-level build.gradle with repositories and classpath. Setup gradle.properties with AndroidX flags

stories.title: Configure iOS Info.plist with HealthKit usage descriptions
stories.description: Setup Info.plist with NSHealthShareUsageDescription, NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription for HealthKit access, UIBackgroundModes for fetch and processing, NSMotionUsageDescription. Add minimum iOS version 13.0

stories.title: Configure iOS entitlements and Podfile
stories.description: Create Runner.entitlements and DebugProfile.entitlements with HealthKit capability. Setup Podfile with iOS 13.0 minimum, use_frameworks!, and health pod configuration

stories.title: Create platform info utilities and permission abstraction
stories.description: Implement PlatformInfo for platform detection (iOS/Android), HealthPermissions class abstracting permission requests for HealthKit on iOS and Health Connect on Android with unified API

stories.title: Configure app icons and splash screens
stories.description: Setup launch backgrounds for Android (launch_background.xml, colors.xml) and iOS asset catalogs for AppIcon and LaunchImage with proper Contents.json configurations

epics.title: UI Foundation - Design System, Navigation, and Reusable Widgets
epics.description: Implement Material Design 3 theming with ColorScheme supporting dark/light mode, go_router navigation setup with auth guards and nested navigation, and comprehensive reusable widget library including buttons, inputs, cards, loading states, error displays, and layout components.
followsPatterns: Material Design 3 guidelines with dynamic color
Theme extension pattern for custom properties
go_router declarative routing with redirect guards

stories.title: Implement Material Design 3 theme system
stories.description: Create AppTheme with light/dark ColorScheme using M3 specs, define app-specific colors in AppColors, create AppTypography with Google Fonts or system fonts, component themes for buttons, cards, inputs, dialogs

stories.title: Create theme provider with persistence
stories.description: Implement ThemeProvider using Riverpod StateNotifier for theme mode (system/light/dark), persist selection to SharedPreferences, expose toggle methods

stories.title: Setup go_router with route definitions
stories.description: Configure GoRouter with shell route for bottom nav, nested routes for features, define RouteNames constants for type-safe navigation, setup initial route based on auth state

stories.title: Implement route guards for authentication
stories.description: Create RouteGuards with redirect logic: unauthenticated users to login, authenticated users away from auth screens, handle token expiration with redirect to login

stories.title: Create reusable button widgets
stories.description: Implement PrimaryButton, SecondaryButton, IconButtonWidget with consistent styling, loading states with CircularProgressIndicator, disabled states, customizable sizes

stories.title: Create reusable input widgets
stories.description: Implement TextInput, PasswordInput (with visibility toggle), SearchInput with debounce, all with validation support, error states, focus handling, consistent styling

stories.title: Create card widgets for data display
stories.description: Implement StatCard for numeric displays with icons, UserCard for friend/user items, InfoCard for general information with title/subtitle/action

stories.title: Create loading state widgets
stories.description: Implement LoadingIndicator (centered spinner), ShimmerLoading (skeleton effect), SkeletonLoader for specific content types (list items, cards)

stories.title: Create error and empty state widgets
stories.description: Implement ErrorDisplayWidget with message and retry action, EmptyState with icon/title/subtitle/action, NetworkError specifically for connectivity issues

stories.title: Create layout widgets with bottom navigation
stories.description: Implement AppScaffold wrapper with SafeArea, BottomNavBar with 4 tabs (Dashboard, Friends, Goals, Profile), CustomAppBar with common actions

stories.title: Create dialog widgets
stories.description: Implement ConfirmDialog with title/message/confirm/cancel buttons, LoadingDialog for blocking operations with optional message

epics.title: Authentication UI - Login, Register, and Token Management
epics.description: Implement complete authentication flow with login, register, and forgot password screens following Clean Architecture. Include auth state management with Riverpod, secure token storage with flutter_secure_storage, auto-login functionality, and token refresh handling in dio interceptor.
followsPatterns: Auto-refresh token handling with dio interceptor

stories.title: Create auth domain entities
stories.description: Implement User entity (id, username, email, createdAt) and AuthTokens entity (accessToken, refreshToken, expiresIn) using equatable for value equality

stories.title: Create auth data models with JSON serialization
stories.description: Implement UserModel and AuthTokensModel with fromJson/toJson methods mapping to backend response format, extend entities for domain layer compatibility

stories.title: Implement auth remote datasource
stories.description: Create AuthRemoteDataSource using dio for API calls: POST /auth/register, POST /auth/login, POST /auth/refresh, GET /auth/me. Handle error responses and throw appropriate exceptions

stories.title: Implement auth local datasource with secure storage
stories.description: Create AuthLocalDataSource using flutter_secure_storage for storing/retrieving/deleting access token, refresh token. Include methods: cacheTokens, getTokens, clearTokens, hasValidTokens

stories.title: Create auth repository interface and implementation
stories.description: Define AuthRepository contract with login, register, logout, getCurrentUser, refreshToken, checkUsername methods returning Either<Failure, T>. Implement with remote/local datasources coordination

stories.title: Implement auth use cases
stories.description: Create single-responsibility use cases: LoginUseCase, RegisterUseCase, LogoutUseCase, GetCurrentUserUseCase, RefreshTokenUseCase, CheckUsernameUseCase. Each takes repository via constructor injection

stories.title: Create auth state management with Riverpod
stories.description: Implement AuthState sealed class (Initial, Loading, Authenticated, Unauthenticated, Error), AuthProvider as StateNotifier managing auth state transitions, expose login/register/logout methods

stories.title: Implement login page with form validation
stories.description: Create LoginPage with email/password fields using reusable inputs, form validation matching backend (email format, password min 6), error display, loading state, forgot password and register links

stories.title: Implement register page with username availability check
stories.description: Create RegisterPage with username/email/password fields, real-time username availability check with debounce (GET /users/check/username/:username), password confirmation, form validation

stories.title: Implement splash and forgot password pages
stories.description: Create SplashPage checking stored tokens and auto-navigating to dashboard or login, ForgotPasswordPage with email input (placeholder for backend implementation), shared AuthForm base widget

stories.title: Register auth dependencies and configure routes
stories.description: Register all auth feature classes in injection_container.dart, add auth routes (/login, /register, /forgot-password, /splash) to app_router.dart with proper guards

epics.title: Dashboard - Step Counter, Charts, and Activity History
epics.description: Build main dashboard with animated today's step counter display, weekly trend bar charts and hourly line charts using fl_chart, comprehensive statistics grid, pull-to-refresh functionality, and scrollable activity history list with local caching for offline support.
followsPatterns: Animated step counter widget with custom painter

stories.title: Create steps domain entities
stories.description: Implement StepRecord (id, userId, count, timestamp, source, hour, date), StepStats (totalSteps, averageDaily, bestDay, streak), WeeklyTrend (List of daily totals), HourlyData (hour, count)

stories.title: Create steps data models with JSON serialization
stories.description: Implement StepModel, StepStatsModel, WeeklyTrendModel, HourlyDataModel with fromJson/toJson mapping to backend responses

stories.title: Implement steps remote datasource
stories.description: Create StepsRemoteDataSource using dio: GET /steps/today, GET /steps/weekly, GET /steps/hourly-peaks?date=YYYY-MM-DD, GET /steps/stats, POST /steps. Handle authorization headers

stories.title: Implement steps local datasource for caching
stories.description: Create StepsLocalDataSource using SharedPreferences or sqflite for caching today's steps, weekly trend, stats. Include cache invalidation after 5 minutes, methods: cacheX, getX, clearCache

stories.title: Create steps repository with caching strategy
stories.description: Define StepsRepository contract, implement with cache-first strategy: return cached data immediately, fetch fresh data in background, update cache. Handle offline mode gracefully

stories.title: Implement steps use cases
stories.description: Create GetTodayStepsUseCase, GetWeeklyTrendUseCase, GetHourlyPeaksUseCase, GetStatsUseCase, RecordStepsUseCase. RecordStepsUseCase should invalidate cache after recording

stories.title: Create steps state management
stories.description: Implement StepsState (Initial, Loading, Loaded with data, Error), StepsProvider as StateNotifier managing step data fetching, refresh, and state transitions

stories.title: Implement animated step counter card widget
stories.description: Create StepCounterCard with animated counter using TweenAnimationBuilder, ProgressRing custom widget showing percentage to daily goal (10,000 default), current steps, goal display

stories.title: Implement weekly and hourly chart widgets using fl_chart
stories.description: Create WeeklyChart as BarChart showing 7-day trend with day labels, HourlyChart as LineChart showing 24-hour distribution with tooltips on touch. Use app colors from theme

stories.title: Implement stats grid and activity list widgets
stories.description: Create StatsGrid with 4 stat cards (Today, Average, Best, Streak), ActivityList as scrollable list of recent step records with source icons and timestamps

stories.title: Implement dashboard and related pages
stories.description: Create DashboardPage with RefreshIndicator, StepCounterCard, StatsGrid, WeeklyChart, quick actions. HistoryPage with date-filtered activity list. StatsDetailPage with full statistics

stories.title: Register steps dependencies and dashboard routes
stories.description: Register all steps feature classes in injection_container.dart, add dashboard as main authenticated route, history and stats detail as sub-routes

epics.title: Sharing UI - Friends List and Activity Sharing
epics.description: Implement complete social sharing feature with friends list displaying shared users, user search with debounced input, sharing request management (send/accept/reject/revoke), friend activity viewing showing shared step data, and pending request badges.
followsPatterns: List with search and filter functionality

stories.title: Create sharing domain entities
stories.description: Implement SharingRelationship (id, requesterId, targetId, status, createdAt, acceptedAt), SharedUser (userId, username, email), SharedUserStats (todaySteps, weeklySteps, lastUpdated)

stories.title: Create sharing data models
stories.description: Implement SharingRelationshipModel, SharedUserModel, SharedUserStatsModel with fromJson/toJson mapping to backend responses

stories.title: Implement sharing remote datasource
stories.description: Create SharingRemoteDataSource: POST /sharing/request, PUT /sharing/:id/accept, PUT /sharing/:id/reject, DELETE /sharing/:id, GET /sharing?status=, GET /sharing/:userId/stats

stories.title: Implement users remote datasource
stories.description: Create UsersRemoteDataSource: GET /users/search?q=&limit=, GET /users/:id, GET /users/username/:username for user lookup

stories.title: Create sharing and users repositories
stories.description: Define SharingRepository and UsersRepository contracts, implement both with remote datasources. SharingRepository handles relationship CRUD, UsersRepository handles search

stories.title: Implement sharing use cases
stories.description: Create GetRelationshipsUseCase (with status filter), SendRequestUseCase, AcceptRequestUseCase, RejectRequestUseCase, RevokeSharingUseCase, SearchUsersUseCase (with debounce), GetSharedUserStatsUseCase

stories.title: Create sharing state management
stories.description: Implement SharingState, SharingProvider for relationships list and actions, UsersProvider for user search with debounced query handling

stories.title: Implement sharing widgets
stories.description: Create FriendCard showing user with steps, RequestCard with accept/reject buttons, UserSearchResult with add friend action, FriendStatsCard for detail view, PendingBadge for nav item

stories.title: Implement friends and requests pages
stories.description: Create FriendsPage with TabBar (Accepted/Pending), RefreshIndicator, FAB to add friend. FriendRequestsPage with incoming requests list and actions

stories.title: Implement user search and friend detail pages
stories.description: Create UserSearchPage with SearchInput, debounced results, loading/empty states. FriendDetailPage with friend info, stats, revoke sharing option

stories.title: Register sharing dependencies and update navigation
stories.description: Register all sharing feature classes, add friends routes, update BottomNavBar with Friends tab and pending badge indicator

epics.title: Goals UI - Group Goals, Progress, and Leaderboards
epics.description: Build comprehensive group goals feature including goal creation with date range picker, member invitation from friends list, real-time progress tracking with animated progress bars, leaderboard rankings with position animations, and goal completion celebration effects.
followsPatterns: Leaderboard ranking with position change animations

stories.title: Create goals domain entities
stories.description: Implement GroupGoal (id, title, description, targetSteps, startDate, endDate, creatorId), GoalMembership (goalId, userId, status, joinedAt), GoalProgress (currentSteps, targetSteps, percentage, isCompleted), MemberContribution (userId, username, steps, rank)

stories.title: Create goals data models
stories.description: Implement GroupGoalModel, GoalMembershipModel, GoalProgressModel, MemberContributionModel with proper date handling (DateTime.parse) and JSON serialization

stories.title: Implement goals remote datasource
stories.description: Create GoalsRemoteDataSource: POST /goals, GET /goals, GET /goals/:id, POST /goals/:id/invite, PUT /goals/:id/join, DELETE /goals/:id/leave, GET /goals/:id/progress

stories.title: Create goals repository
stories.description: Define GoalsRepository contract, implement with remote datasource for all goal operations. Handle creator-only restrictions for invite operations

stories.title: Implement goals use cases
stories.description: Create CreateGoalUseCase, GetUserGoalsUseCase, GetGoalDetailsUseCase, InviteUserUseCase, JoinGoalUseCase, LeaveGoalUseCase, GetGoalProgressUseCase

stories.title: Create goals state management
stories.description: Implement GoalsState (Initial, Loading, Loaded, Creating, Error), GoalsProvider managing goals list, selected goal details, CRUD operations

stories.title: Implement goal card and progress widgets
stories.description: Create GoalCard showing title, progress percentage, date range, member count. GoalProgressBar with animated width and percentage label

stories.title: Implement member list and leaderboard widgets
stories.description: Create MemberList showing goal members with status indicators. LeaderboardWidget with ranked list, podium display, animated position changes

stories.title: Implement goal form and dialogs
stories.description: Create GoalForm with title, description, targetSteps inputs. DateRangePicker widget for start/end dates. InviteMemberDialog showing searchable friends list

stories.title: Implement completion celebration widget
stories.description: Create CompletionCelebration with confetti animation using flutter_confetti or custom CustomPainter, victory sound option, share achievement button

stories.title: Implement goals list and detail pages
stories.description: Create GoalsListPage with TabBar (Active/Completed/Invitations), FAB to create. GoalDetailPage with progress, leaderboard, member list, leave/invite actions based on role

stories.title: Implement create goal and invitations pages
stories.description: Create CreateGoalPage with GoalForm and DateRangePicker. GoalInvitationsPage showing pending goal invitations with accept/decline actions

stories.title: Register goals dependencies and update navigation
stories.description: Register all goals feature classes, add goals routes, update BottomNavBar with Goals tab and invitation badge indicator

epics.title: Native Integration - Health APIs, Pedometer, and Background Sync
epics.description: Integrate native health APIs using health package for reading steps from HealthKit (iOS) and Google Fit/Health Connect (Android). Implement permission handling with clear UX, background sync service using workmanager, and data normalization layer for consistent backend submission.
followsPatterns: Platform channel abstraction for health APIs
Data normalization for consistency between HealthKit and Google Fit
Permission request flow with clear explanation UI

stories.title: Create health domain entities
stories.description: Implement HealthData (steps, startTime, endTime, source, platform), HealthPermissionStatus enum (unknown, denied, authorized, restricted) with helper methods

stories.title: Create health data model
stories.description: Implement HealthDataModel with fromHealthDataPoint conversion (from health package), JSON serialization for caching synced data with timestamps

stories.title: Implement health datasource abstraction and implementation
stories.description: Create abstract HealthDataSource interface with requestPermissions, hasPermissions, getStepsInRange methods. Implement using health package with platform-specific HealthDataType handling

stories.title: Create health repository
stories.description: Define HealthRepository contract, implement combining health datasource with network calls to POST steps to backend. Track last sync time to avoid duplicates

stories.title: Implement health use cases
stories.description: Create RequestPermissionsUseCase (with explanation before request), GetStepsFromHealthUseCase (date range query), SyncHealthDataUseCase (fetch + upload), CheckPermissionsUseCase

stories.title: Create health state management
stories.description: Implement HealthState (PermissionUnknown, PermissionDenied, PermissionGranted, Syncing, SyncComplete, SyncError), HealthProvider managing permission flow and sync operations

stories.title: Implement background sync service with workmanager
stories.description: Create BackgroundSyncService using workmanager for periodic 15-minute syncs, WorkmanagerConfig for task registration, handle iOS background fetch and Android work constraints

stories.title: Implement health data normalizer
stories.description: Create HealthDataNormalizer to convert HealthKit/Google Fit data to unified format, handle timezone differences, aggregate hourly data, format for backend POST /steps

stories.title: Implement health permission and sync widgets
stories.description: Create HealthPermissionCard explaining why permission needed, SyncStatusWidget showing last sync time and manual sync button, HealthSourceIndicator showing HealthKit/Google Fit icon

stories.title: Implement health connect and settings pages
stories.description: Create HealthConnectPage for initial onboarding permission request, HealthSettingsPage for managing permissions, toggling background sync, viewing sync history

stories.title: Integrate health with steps feature
stories.description: Update StepsRepositoryImpl to use health data, modify StepsProvider to trigger health sync, register health dependencies, add health package to pubspec.yaml

epics.title: Real-Time Client - WebSocket, Events, and Push Notifications
epics.description: Implement WebSocket client with socket_io_client for real-time step updates and goal progress synchronization. Include exponential backoff reconnection, event handling for all backend events, and Firebase Cloud Messaging integration for push notifications with proper permission handling.
followsPatterns: socket_io_client for Socket.io compatibility with backend
Exponential backoff with jitter for reconnection
FCM token management with server registration

stories.title: Create socket event definitions
stories.description: Define all WebSocket events matching backend: SocketEvents class with static const strings for steps-updated, sharing:joined, goal-progress, goal:joined, goal:member-joined, error, subscribe-goal

stories.title: Implement socket client core with socket_io_client
stories.description: Create SocketClient singleton using socket_io_client package for Socket.io compatibility, connection management, emit/on methods, SocketState enum (disconnected, connecting, connected, error)

stories.title: Implement socket authentication
stories.description: Create SocketAuth handling JWT token injection on connection via auth options, token refresh before reconnect, logout disconnect handling

stories.title: Implement reconnection strategy
stories.description: Create ReconnectionStrategy with exponential backoff (1s, 2s, 4s... max 30s), random jitter, max 10 attempts, connection quality detection, manual reconnect trigger

stories.title: Implement socket event handler
stories.description: Create SocketEventHandler dispatching events to feature providers: steps-updated to StepsProvider, goal-progress to GoalsProvider, sharing:joined logs, error handling

stories.title: Create notifications domain entities
stories.description: Implement AppNotification (id, type, title, body, data, createdAt, isRead), NotificationSettings (enabled, friendRequests, goalUpdates, achievements)

stories.title: Create notifications data models
stories.description: Implement NotificationModel, FcmTokenModel with JSON serialization for backend token registration and notification persistence

stories.title: Implement notifications datasources
stories.description: Create NotificationsRemoteDataSource for FCM token registration to backend, NotificationsLocalDataSource using sqflite/hive for notification history storage

stories.title: Create notifications repository
stories.description: Define NotificationsRepository contract, implement with remote/local datasources for FCM management and notification persistence

stories.title: Implement notifications use cases
stories.description: Create InitializeFcmUseCase (request permission, get token, register), HandleNotificationUseCase (parse, store, display), UpdateFcmTokenUseCase, GetNotificationsUseCase

stories.title: Implement FCM and notification services
stories.description: Create FcmService with Firebase Messaging initialization, token retrieval/refresh, foreground/background message handling. NotificationHandler with flutter_local_notifications for display. Generate firebase_options.dart

stories.title: Create notifications state management
stories.description: Implement NotificationsState, NotificationsProvider for notification list and unread count, SocketProvider managing socket connection state and exposing it to UI

stories.title: Implement notification widgets
stories.description: Create NotificationCard with icon, title, body, timestamp, read indicator. NotificationBadge for app bar showing unread count

stories.title: Implement notifications pages
stories.description: Create NotificationsPage with list of notifications, mark all read action, delete options. NotificationSettingsPage with toggles for each notification type

stories.title: Integrate real-time with existing features
stories.description: Update StepsProvider, SharingProvider, GoalsProvider to listen to socket events and update state accordingly. Add socket connection status indicator to UI

stories.title: Register real-time dependencies and update main
stories.description: Register all real-time and notification classes in DI, update main.dart for FCM initialization, workmanager registration, socket connection on auth, add dependencies to pubspec.yaml
